bool allEqual(R)(R range) if (isInputRange!R);
Returns:
true iff all elements in range are equal (or range is empty).

http:
//stackoverflow.com/questions/19258556/equality-of-all-elements-in-a-range/19292822?noredirect=1#19292822

Possible alternatives or aliases: allElementsEqual, haveEqualElements

pure nothrow @safe bool allEqualTo(R, E)(R range, E element) if (isInputRange!R && is(ElementType!R == E));
Returns:
true iff all elements in range are equal (or range is empty) to .

Possible alternatives or aliases: allElementsEqualTo

Check if all Elements of are zero.

pure nothrow @nogc @safe bool isDefaulted(T)(in T a);
Returns:
true iff is set to the default/initial value of its type .
